suggest.amasty/module-recurring-payments-mftf-2: Install module-recurring-payments-mftf-2 module to be able to run Recurring Payments MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-recurring-payments-mftf-3: Install module-recurring-payments-mftf-3 module to be able to run Recurring Payments MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
